title: Credit Card Companies CAVE to Dems to Create a Gun Registry | Guest: Frank Siller | 9/12/22
description:
Major credit card companies, including Visa and Mastercard, are making moves to categorize gun and ammunition sales, which could lead to extreme limits on when and where you can purchase guns and ammo. Glenn and Pat discuss the dangers of King Charles III's beliefs. Glenn talks about the importance of knowing history and why many in power are trying to change or destroy history. Glenn recalls the 9/12 Project he created and goes through its values and principles to see if they're still admired today. Frank Siller, CEO of the Tunnel to Towers Foundation, joins to express the importance of teaching younger generations about the heroism of September 11, 2001. Glenn and Pat critique Visa's statement regarding the company's move to categorize gun and ammo sales.
